content.searchDescription: This skill class allows users to manage data in ArcGIS Pro, including modifying data in database and geodatabase workspaces.

aiAssistantFunction.name: GetAllWorkspaces
aiAssistantFunction.searchDescription: Returns a list of all database and geodatabase (gdb) workspaces in the current project.

aiAssistantFunction.name: GetAllDatasets
aiAssistantFunction.searchDescription: Returns a list of all the datasets in the database or geodatabase (gdb) workspace.

aiAssistantFunction.name: OpenDatabaseWorkspaceProperties
aiAssistantFunction.searchDescription: Open properties for a geodatabase (gdb) platform or database workspace.

aiAssistantFunction.name: OpenFieldsView
aiAssistantFunction.searchDescription: Opens fields view for the specified dataset to show or discover what fields and columns it has.

aiAssistantFunction.name: CreateNewFeatureClass
aiAssistantFunction.searchDescription: Opens new feature class wizard to allow creation of a new feature class (fc) in the specified database or geodatabase (gdb) workspace.

aiAssistantFunction.name: OpenDatasetProperties
aiAssistantFunction.searchDescription: Opens properties for the specified dataset.

aiAssistantFunction.name: EnableBranchVersioningOnDatasetInGdb
aiAssistantFunction.searchDescription: Opens manage properties page to enable branch versioning on the specified dataset in a geodatabase (gdb) workspace.

aiAssistantFunction.name: ManageGdbDataset
aiAssistantFunction.searchDescription: Opens manage properties page for the specified dataset in a geodatabase (gdb) workspace.

button.caption: Save Manifest to Project Folder

button.caption: Download to Project Folder

button.caption: New BIM Cloud Connection
button.extendedCaption: Create a new BIM Cloud connection and add it to the project.
button.tooltip:
Connect to BIM Cloud platform. Add the connection to the project.
A new BIM Cloud Connection file is created in the project's home folder and is referenced by the project. The current project already contains a BIM Cloud Connection.

button.tooltip: Disables topology on a parcel fabric. System-defined parcel rules and topology rules and parcel fabric feature classes will be removed from the topology.

button.tooltip: Upgrades the schema of the parcel fabric to the latest ArcGIS Pro release version. Upgrade the parcel fabric to to use the latest released functionality.The parcel fabric is upgraded to the latest ArcGIS Pro release version.

button.caption: Import And Open
button.extendedCaption: Import a map, globe, or scene document to the project; on document context menu
button.tooltip:
Import an existing ArcMap, ArcGlobe, or ArcScene document or a map service definition file to the project.
The original data frames and layout are converted to the ArcGIS Pro map and layout format and added to the project. Future changes to the original document are not reflected in the project. One of the new maps or the layout is opened in a view.

button.tooltip: The layout and associated maps stored in the layout file will be added to the project. Only a view of the layout will open.

button.tooltip: The presentation will be added to the project and its view will open.

button.tooltip: Manage all replicas for this geodatabase item.

button.caption: Create Replica...
button.extendedCaption: Open the create replica GP tool; on context menu
button.tooltip: Creates a replica in a geodatabase from a specified list of feature classes, layers, datasets, and tables in an enterprise geodatabase.

button.caption: Synchronize Changes...
button.extendedCaption: Open the synchronizeChanges GP tool; on context menu
button.tooltip: Synchronizes updates between two replica geodatabases in a specified direction.

button.caption: Export Data Change Message...
button.extendedCaption: Open the export data change message GP tool; on context menu
button.tooltip: Creates an output delta file containing updates from an input replica.

button.caption: Export Acknowledgement Message...
button.extendedCaption: Open the export acknowledgement message GP tool; on context menu
button.tooltip: Creates an output acknowledgement file to acknowledge the reception of previously received data change messages.

button.caption: Import Message...
button.extendedCaption: Open the import message GP tool; on context menu
button.tooltip: Imports changes from a delta file into a replica geodatabase or imports an acknowledgment message into a replica geodatabase.

button.caption: Re-Export Unacknowledged Messages...
button.extendedCaption: Open the re-export unacknowledged messages GP tool; on context menu
button.tooltip: Creates an output delta file containing unacknowledged replica updates from a one-way or two-way replica geodatabase.

button.caption: Import Schema Changes...
button.extendedCaption: Open the Import Schema Changes GP tool; on context menu
button.tooltip: Applies replica schema differences using an input replica geodatabase and an XML schema file.

button.caption: Export Replica Schema...
button.extendedCaption: Open the Export Replica Schema GP tool; on context menu
button.tooltip: Creates a replica schema file with the schema of an input one-way or two-way replica.

button.caption: Compare Replica Schema...
button.extendedCaption: Open the Compare Replica Schema GP tool; on context menu
button.tooltip: Generates an .xml file that describes schema differences between a replica geodatabase and the relative replica geodatabase.
